select inwh.id, inwh.in_wh_no, inwh.in_wh_status, inwh.in_wh_qty, inwh.in_wh_type, inwh.created_time, staff.full_name as createdByName from ope_in_whouse_order inwh left join ope_sys_staff staff on staff.id = inwh.created_by
order by inwh.created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select * from ope_in_whouse_parts_b parts left join ope_in_whouse_order inwhouse on inwhouse.id = parts.in_wh_id left join ope_production_purchase_order purchase on purchase.id = inwhouse.relation_order_id where parts.dr = 0 and purchase.id = #{productionPurchaseId}
